    • Constructor Detail

      • Dungeon

        Dungeon(java.lang.String name,
        Room entry)

      • Dungeon

        public Dungeon(java.lang.String filename)
        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
               Dungeon.IllegalDungeonFormatException
        Read from the .bork filename passed, and instantiate a Dungeon object based on it.
        Parameters:
        filename - full bork file name including extension
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Dungeon.IllegalDungeonFormatException

      • Dungeon

        public Dungeon(java.lang.String filename,
               boolean initState)
        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
               Dungeon.IllegalDungeonFormatException
        Read from the .bork filename passed, and instantiate a Dungeon object based on it, including (possibly) the items/NPCs in their original locations.
        Parameters:
        filename - filename full bork file name including extension
        initState - represents the desire to reload the map or restore
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Dungeon.IllegalDungeonFormatException

      • getRoom

        public Room getRoom(java.lang.String roomTitle)
        Get the Room object whose name is passed. This has nothing to do with where the Adventurer might be.
        Parameters:
        roomTitle - room name
        Returns:
        room object from rooms hashtable keyed by room name

      • getItem

        public Item getItem(java.lang.String primaryItemName)
             throws Item.NoItemException
        Get the Item object whose primary name is passed. This has nothing to do with where the Adventurer might be, or what's in his/her inventory, etc.
        Parameters:
        primaryItemName - String - Used as key for items hashtable
        Returns:
        Item object from items hashtable
        Throws:
        Item.NoItemException
